Invocations for breaking the fast.ARABIC_TEXT: ((ذَهَبَ الظَّمَأُ وَابْتَلَّتِ العُرُوقُ، وَثَبَتَ الْأَجْرُ إِنْ شَاءَ اللَّهُ)).
Invocations for breaking the fast.TRANSLATED_TEXT: (The thirst has gone and the veins are quenched, and reward is confirmed, if Allah wills.)

Invocations for breaking the fast.ARABIC_TEXT: ((اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ بِرَحْمَتِكَ الَّتِي وَسِعَتْ كُلَّ شَيْءٍ أَنْ تَغْفِرَ لِي)).
Invocations for breaking the fast.LANGUAGE_ARABIC_TRANSLATED_TEXT: (Allahumma inne as-aluka birahmatikal-latee wasiAAat kulla shay, an taghfira lee.)
Invocations for breaking the fast.TRANSLATED_TEXT: (O Allah, I ask You by Your mercy which envelopes all things, that You forgive me.)
